assistantMessage.text:
Here are the Termux commands to create the directory structure for the Android port:

```bash
cd storage/shared
```

```bash
mkdir -p BanjoPort/app/src/main/java/com/banjo/game/actors
```

```bash
mkdir -p BanjoPort/app/src/main/java/com/banjo/game/core
```

```bash
touch BanjoPort/app/src/main/java/com/banjo/game/actors/BigAlligator.java
```

```bash
touch BanjoPort/app/src/main/java/com/banjo/game/core/ActorInfo.java
```

These commands will set up the perfect directory structure for your Android port in your shared storage, making it easily accessible. The project is now ready for you to add the Java source files.
